nodes.text: Army C was part of the Trade Federation Droid Army, consisting of Armored Assault Tanks and Multi-Troop Transports. In 32 BBY, during the Invasion of Naboo, it was sent to flank the Gungan Grand Army during the Battle of Grassy Plains. Army C was destroyed by Lieutenant Gavyn Sykes, a pilot of the Royal Naboo Security Forces.

Army C first appeared in the 2000 video game Star Wars: Episode I: Battle for Naboo. It was identified in a diagram of the Battle of Grassy Plains in the reference book The New Essential Guide to Vehicles and Vessels.
